long_description: The lightweight, rimless Smith PivLock V2 sunglasses feature an adjustable nose piece and interchangeable lens system that all will appreciate-especially runners and cyclists. Same as the PivLock V2 Max but with a smaller silhouette, the V2 sunglasses are medium-sized with wrap-around coverage. With the PivLock interchangeable system, simply rotate temple piece up 45deg and remove from lens; to remove nosepiece, grasp lens and pull piece away. Scratch- and impact-resistant Carbonic lenses use Tapered Lens Technology from Smith to provide distortion-free vision. Tapered Lens Technology contours the thickness of the lens so that light travels through without distortion-what you see is what you get. Permanent lens coating repels moisture, grease and grime to keep your vision clear. Both frames feature gray lenses with a platinum mirror finish to reduce visible light and glare while preserving natural colors in order to provide true color definition. 2 additional sets of lenses included: rose Ignitor lenses with mirror coating for medium light/overcast conditions; clear mirror lenses for low light to night conditions. Includes a total of 3 sets of lenses. 7 base curve lenses; Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature-the higher the number, the more curved the lenses. Frames are made from a bio-plastic derived from non-GMO castor seeds and lightweight nylon for a resilient, consistent fit. Hydrophilic temple and nose pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather; slide-on temple tips. Adjustable nose bridge lets you customize the fit from narrow, medium or wide, to find your ideal fit and comfort level. Includes protective case.
